Jargon Term: You will continue to need pain medication once you are home but you can wean it over a few weeks as the discomfort resolves
Use a stool softener or gentle laxative to stay regular
Take Tylenol 650 mg every 6 hours in between your narcotic
If your doctor allows you may also take Ibuprofen to help relieve the pain
Continue to stay well hydrated and eat well to heal your incisions
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: No tub bathing, swimming or hot tubs until incision healed
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other
